name: Pozt Office
tag_list: mobile, communications, android, mobile-application, voip, im, viber, whatsapp, skype
overview:
We are committed to relieve homesickness for our target segment via an Android application.

We here at Pozt Office are excited to be pioneering in the online communication industry and excited to be able to offer our valued customers products which help broaden mobile internet communication technology.

Pozt Office is a company comprised of excited individuals who have been working in the telecommunications field for many years and who have come together to challenge conventional communications and introduce products which allow everyone to connect using internet technologies and not just the people who are privileged with the opportunity to use the services of larger companies. We know that staying connected is important, and we want to bring more people together. We are offering applications which allow you to take advantage of forms of communication like free voice and text chatting as well as lots of other unique features.

We know how tough it is to earn a living, so our product development engineers are hard at work developing free mobile applications that will allow you to connect with your loved ones wherever you are. Whether you have immigrated to a new country in search of a better life or are living abroad for other reasons, our products will help you feel close to home.
